attributes.action: Reduce or Remove TV Licence Fee for University Media Students
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As University Students we pay at the moment atleast £3,000 a year just to attend university, then it's another £3000 - £4000 a year just to live, Why on top of that should we pay £150 on a TV Licence so we can Study for our Subject. I call for a 50% reduction or Free TV Licence for University Students Studying things such as; 

Television 
Film 
Radio 
Media
